resources.string: Your Android Version not support this function
Do you want to reset to default setting?
1. Tap "Enable" Toggle button to enable the function, a float view will show up.
2. Long Click: Long lick the float view 2 seconds, then you can move the view position. So when you try to operate other gesture, do not long click.
3. Quick Slide: When try quick left/right/up/down slide operation, slide from the view, move forwards to the target direction for a distance, then quick release.
4. Wake up Screen: When your phone screen locked, rotate from upside down to upside up, the screen will wake up.(default)
5. Rotate Shot: Rotate phone from rightside down to rightside up.
6. Specific Gesture and Operation please refer to the Gesture Setting page.
7. If you want to uninstall, please go setting>security>device admin and deactive this app.
